competitors.name: MSC Software
competitors.notes: Nastran structural analysis and Adams dynamics

competitors.name: ABAQUS
competitors.notes: Nonlinear finite element analysis, independent before Dassault acquisition

competitors.name: Fluent
competitors.notes: CFD software, later acquired by ANSYS in 2006

competitors.name: SDRC
competitors.notes: I-DEAS simulation, later merged with EDS

context: ANSYS, Inc. is a engineering simulation software company focused on finite element analysis, CFD, electromagnetics, and multiphysics simulation. Leader in structural analysis software. Acquired multiple simulation companies.
